headline: Mag 7 Earnings Could Spark a Year-End Surge. What the Charts of Meta, Google, Amazon Say.
summary: After a brief pause, one of the marketâ€™s key leadership groups, the Magnificent Seven, is firming up again.  All components except  Nvidia  are scheduled to report earnings by the end of next week, and those results could set the tone for a year-end rally.  The stock broke out of a bull flag formation to close at a new all-time high.
